oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Nathaniel Hawthorn and Herman Melville Covers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Woodcuts (prints);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Three color window card (black, brown, and light blue on white) featuring the covers of Nathaniel Hawthorne's Mosses From An Old Manse and Herman Melville's Benito Cereno. Poster features woodcuts of a house and a boat.
